title: Courgette, Leek and Goat's Cheese Quiche
ingredients: ['375g ready-rolled shortcrust pastry', '20g butter', '1 large courgette, chopped', '1 leek, trimmed and thinly sliced', "125g goat's cheese, crumbled", '2 eggs', '150ml semi-skimmed milk', '4 tbsp single or whipping cream (or use extra milk)', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
